name: Kewl Tune Cue
effectText: If this card on the field would be used as Synchro Material, 1 Tuner in your hand can be used as 1 of the other materials. You can only use each of the following effects of "Kewl Tune Cue" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Tuner from your hand, Deck, or GY, except "Kewl Tune Cue", also for the rest of this turn you cannot Special Summon, except Tuners. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can excavate 2 cards from the top of your opponent's Deck, banish 1 of them, and place the other on the top or bottom of the Deck.
